data.title: A Shower / Left A Site Trapwire Variations
data.description: Use these Trapwires and Cyber Cages to create different variations of Setups to counter the enemy team. Try to be unpredictable, and keep them guessing.

data.title: A Short Full Utility Setup
data.description: Here are some useful Trapwire variations, with Cyber Cage placements to match, and a Spy Cam that watches both the Shower and Short chokepoints connecting to Site.

data.title: Front B Site Trapwire + Cage Setup
data.description: Here's a great full utility Setup for the front of B Site.

data.title: Hookah Delay / Chokepoint Hold Setup
data.description: Here's a great delay / chokepoint hold setup for Hookah that allows you to play either from inside of Hookah or from anywhere else on the map if you want to hold Hookah more passively.
